biospecimen_type.name: biospecimen_type
biospecimen_type.description: Description of the kind of biospecimen that was collected

codeList: Cell line - derived from xenograft tumor
Metastatic tumor - metastasis local to lymph node
Metastatic tumor - metastasis to distant location
Normal - tissue adjacent to primary tumor
Xenograft - derived from tumor cell line
Derived from allogenic bone marrow transplant
Derived from autologous bone marrow transplant

biospecimen_anatomic_location.name: biospecimen_anatomic_location
biospecimen_anatomic_location.description: Indicate the ICD-O-3 topography code for the anatomic location of a biospecimen when it was collected

meta.notes: Refer to guidelines in the ICD-O-3 manual: ICD-O-3 manual at https://apps.who.int/iris/handle/10665/42344

tumor_histological_type.name: tumor_histological_type
tumor_histological_type.description: The code to represent the histology (morphology) of neoplasms that is usually obtained from a pathology report, according to the International Classification of Diseases for Oncology, 3rd Edition (WHO ICD-O-3)

meta.notes: If biospecimen is a tumor, Refer to the ICD-O-3 manual for guidelines at https://apps.who.int/iris/handle/10665/42344

codeList: Cryopreservation of live cells in liquid nitrogen

meta.notes: For biospecimens that were freshly extracted or immediately cultured, select Not Applicable.

meta.notes: Codes are taken from NCI Thesaurus (NCIt) at http://purl.obolibrary.org/obo/ncit.owl Derived Cell Line (NCIT:C156445), Metastatic Tumor Sample (NCIT:156440), Sample Derived from New Primary (NCIT:156441), Tumor-Adjacent Normal Specimen (NCIT:164032), Tumor Tissue (NCIT:C18009), Normal Tissue Segment (NCIT:C162623), Cell Line-Derived Xenograft (NCIT:C156443)

cancer_biospecimen_anatomic_location_sou.name: cancer_biospecimen_anatomic_location_source_text

description.left: Participant's age (in days) at diagnosis of condition

notes.left: This field is only required to be submitted if the participant's diagnosis is cancer
notes.right: This field is only required to be submitted if the donor's diagnosis is cancer

left:
(function validate(inputs) {
        let result = {valid: true, message: 'Ok'};

        const {$row, $name} = inputs;
        const $field = $row[$name];

        if(!$field){
            return result;
        }

        const isCancer = $row.is_cancer && $row.is_cancer.trim().toLowerCase() == "true";

        if ($field && !$row.tumor_staging_system) {
            result = {
                valid: false,
                message: `Please provide a value for the tumor_staging_system or leave stage_group blank`,
            };
        }

        if (isCancer && !$field) {
            result = {
                valid: false,
                message: `The stage_group mandatory if the is_cancer flag is set to 1/true`,
            };
        }

        if ($field) {
            let codeList = [];
            switch ($row.tumor_staging_system && $row.tumor_staging_system.trim().toLowerCase()) {
                case 'revised international staging system (riss)':
                    codeList = ['stage i', 'stage ii', 'stage iii'];
                    break;
                case 'lugano staging system':
                    codeList = [
                        'stage i',
                        'stage ia',
                        'stage ib',
                        'stage ie',
                        'stage iea',
                        'stage ieb',
                        'stage ii',
                        'stage iia',
                        'stage iib',
                        'stage iie',
                        'stage iiea',
                        'stage iieb',
                        'stage iii',
                        'stage iiia',
                        'stage iiib',
                        'stage iv',
                        'stage iva',
                        'stage ivb',
                    ];
                    break;
                case 'st jude staging system':
                    codeList = ['stage i', 'stage ii', 'stage iii', 'stage iv'];
                    break;
                case 'ann arbor staging system':
                    codeList = [
                        'stage i',
                        'stage ia',
                        'stage ib',
                        'stage ie',
                        'stage is',
                        'stage ii',
                        'stage iia',
                        'stage iib',
                        'stage iie',
                        'stage iis',
                        'stage iii',
                        'stage iiia',
                        'stage iiib',
                        'stage iiie',
                        'stage iiis',
                        'stage iv',
                        'stage iva',
                        'stage ivb',
                        'stage ive',
                        'stage ivs',
                    ];
                    break;
                case 'rai staging system':
                    codeList = ['stage 0', 'stage i', 'stage ii', 'stage iii', 'stage iv'];
                    break;
                case 'durie-salmon staging system':
                    codeList = [
                        'stage 1',
                        'stage 1a',
                        'stage 1b',
                        'stage ii',
                        'stage iia',
                        'stage iib',
                        'stage iii',
                        'stage iiia',
                        'stage iiib',
                    ];
                    break;
                case 'figo staging system':
                    codeList = [
                        'stage ia',
                        'stage ia1',
                        'stage ia2',
                        'stage ib',
                        'stage ib1',
                        'stage ib2',
                        'stage iia',
                        'stage iab',
                        'stage iiia',
                        'stage iiib',
                        'stage iva',
                        'stage ivb',
                    ];
                    break;
                case 'binet staging system':
                    codeList = ['stage a', 'stage b', 'stage c'];
                    break;
                case 'ajcc 8th edition':
                    codeList = [
                        'stage 0',
                        'stage 0a',
                        'stage 0is',
                        'stage i',
                        'stage ia',
                        'stage ia1',
                        'stage ia2',
                        'stage ia3',
                        'stage ib',
                        'stage ib1',
                        'stage ib2',
                        'stage ic',
                        'stage ie',
                        'stage is',
                        'stage ii',
                        'stage iia',
                        'stage iia1',
                        'stage iia2',
                        'stage iib',
                        'stage iic',
                        'stage iie',
                        'stage iii',
                        'stage iiia',
                        'stage iiia1',
                        'stage iiia2',
                        'stage iiib',
                        'stage iiic',
                        'stage iiic1',
                        'stage iiic2',
                        'stage iiid',
                        'stage iv',
                        'stage iva',
                        'stage iva1',
                        'stage iva2',
                        'stage ivb',
                        'stage ivc',
                        'occult carcinoma',
                        'stage 1',
                    ];
                    break;
                case 'ajcc 7th edition':
                    codeList = [
                        'stage 0',
                        'stage 0a',
                        'stage 0is',
                        'stage i',
                        'stage ia',
                        'stage ia1',
                        'stage ia2',
                        'stage ib',
                        'stage ib1',
                        'stage ib2',
                        'stage ic',
                        'stage is',
                        'stage ii',
                        'stage iia',
                        'stage iia1',
                        'stage iia2',
                        'stage iib',
                        'stage iic',
                        'stage iii',
                        'stage iiia',
                        'stage iiib',
                        'stage iiic',
                        'stage iiic1',
                        'stage iiic2',
                        'stage iv',
                        'stage iva',
                        'stage iva1',
                        'stage iva2',
                        'stage ivb',
                        'stage ivc',
                        'occult carcinoma',
                        'stage 1',
                    ];
                    break;
                default:
                    codelist = [];
            }

            if (!codeList.includes($field.trim().toLowerCase()) && codeList.length) {
                const msg = `'${$field}' is not a permissible value. When 'tumor_staging_system' is set to '${
                    $row.tumor_staging_system
                }', 'stage_group' must be one of the following: \n${codeList
                    .map((code) => `- "${code}"`)
                    .join('\n')}`;

                result.valid = false;
                result.message = msg;
            }
        }
        return result;
    })
right:
(function validate(inputs) {
        let result = {valid: true, message: 'Ok'};

        const {$row, $name} = inputs;
        const $field = $row[$name];

        if(!$field){
            return result;
        }

        const isCancer = $row.is_cancer && $row.is_cancer.trim().toLowerCase() == "true";

        if ($field && !$row.tumour_staging_system) {
            result = {
                valid: false,
                message: `Please provide a value for the tumour_staging_system or leave stage_group blank`,
            };
        }

        if (isCancer && !$field) {
            result = {
                valid: false,
                message: `The stage_group mandatory if the is_cancer flag is set to 1/true`,
            };
        }

        if ($field) {
            let codeList = [];
            switch ($row.tumour_staging_system && $row.tumour_staging_system.trim().toLowerCase()) {
                case 'revised international staging system (riss)':
                    codeList = ['stage i', 'stage ii', 'stage iii'];
                    break;
                case 'lugano staging system':
                    codeList = [
                        'stage i',
                        'stage ia',
                        'stage ib',
                        'stage ie',
                        'stage iea',
                        'stage ieb',
                        'stage ii',
                        'stage iia',
                        'stage iib',
                        'stage iie',
                        'stage iiea',
                        'stage iieb',
                        'stage iii',
                        'stage iiia',
                        'stage iiib',
                        'stage iv',
                        'stage iva',
                        'stage ivb',
                    ];
                    break;
                case 'st jude staging system':
                    codeList = ['stage i', 'stage ii', 'stage iii', 'stage iv'];
                    break;
                case 'ann arbor staging system':
                    codeList = [
                        'stage i',
                        'stage ia',
                        'stage ib',
                        'stage ie',
                        'stage is',
                        'stage ii',
                        'stage iia',
                        'stage iib',
                        'stage iie',
                        'stage iis',
                        'stage iii',
                        'stage iiia',
                        'stage iiib',
                        'stage iiie',
                        'stage iiis',
                        'stage iv',
                        'stage iva',
                        'stage ivb',
                        'stage ive',
                        'stage ivs',
                    ];
                    break;
                case 'rai staging system':
                    codeList = ['stage 0', 'stage i', 'stage ii', 'stage iii', 'stage iv'];
                    break;
                case 'durie-salmon staging system':
                    codeList = [
                        'stage 1',
                        'stage 1a',
                        'stage 1b',
                        'stage ii',
                        'stage iia',
                        'stage iib',
                        'stage iii',
                        'stage iiia',
                        'stage iiib',
                    ];
                    break;
                case 'figo staging system':
                    codeList = [
                        'stage ia',
                        'stage ia1',
                        'stage ia2',
                        'stage ib',
                        'stage ib1',
                        'stage ib2',
                        'stage iia',
                        'stage iab',
                        'stage iiia',
                        'stage iiib',
                        'stage iva',
                        'stage ivb',
                    ];
                    break;
                case 'binet staging system':
                    codeList = ['stage a', 'stage b', 'stage c'];
                    break;
                case 'ajcc 8th edition':
                    codeList = [
                        'stage 0',
                        'stage 0a',
                        'stage 0is',
                        'stage i',
                        'stage ia',
                        'stage ia1',
                        'stage ia2',
                        'stage ia3',
                        'stage ib',
                        'stage ib1',
                        'stage ib2',
                        'stage ic',
                        'stage ie',
                        'stage is',
                        'stage ii',
                        'stage iia',
                        'stage iia1',
                        'stage iia2',
                        'stage iib',
                        'stage iic',
                        'stage iie',
                        'stage iii',
                        'stage iiia',
                        'stage iiia1',
                        'stage iiia2',
                        'stage iiib',
                        'stage iiic',
                        'stage iiic1',
                        'stage iiic2',
                        'stage iiid',
                        'stage iv',
                        'stage iva',
                        'stage iva1',
                        'stage iva2',
                        'stage ivb',
                        'stage ivc',
                        'occult carcinoma',
                        'stage 1',
                    ];
                    break;
                case 'ajcc 7th edition':
                    codeList = [
                        'stage 0',
                        'stage 0a',
                        'stage 0is',
                        'stage i',
                        'stage ia',
                        'stage ia1',
                        'stage ia2',
                        'stage ib',
                        'stage ib1',
                        'stage ib2',
                        'stage ic',
                        'stage is',
                        'stage ii',
                        'stage iia',
                        'stage iia1',
                        'stage iia2',
                        'stage iib',
                        'stage iic',
                        'stage iii',
                        'stage iiia',
                        'stage iiib',
                        'stage iiic',
                        'stage iiic1',
                        'stage iiic2',
                        'stage iv',
                        'stage iva',
                        'stage iva1',
                        'stage iva2',
                        'stage ivb',
                        'stage ivc',
                        'occult carcinoma',
                        'stage 1',
                    ];
                    break;
                default:
                    codelist = [];
            }

            if (!codeList.includes($field.trim().toLowerCase()) && codeList.length) {
                const msg = `'${$field}' is not a permissible value. When 'tumour_staging_system' is set to '${
                    $row.tumour_staging_system
                }', 'stage_group' must be one of the following: \n${codeList
                    .map((code) => `- "${code}"`)
                    .join('\n')}`;

                result.valid = false;
                result.message = msg;
            }
        }
        return result;
    })

submitter_donor_id.name: submitter_donor_id
submitter_donor_id.description: Identifier of the donor, assigned by the data provider

meta.notes: Alphanumeric characters along with dot, hyphens and underscores are supported.  Maximum of 250 characters.

is_self_reported.name: is_self_reported
is_self_reported.description: Indicates whether the information is reported by donor or extracted from (administrative) health records

diagnosis_type.name: diagnosis_type
diagnosis_type.description: Indicate if the diagnosis is based on clinical or histological (histo-pathological) criteria

meta.notes: Basis of diagnosis is only required to be submitted if the donor's diagnosis is cancer

submitter_participant_id.name: submitter_participant_id
submitter_participant_id.description: Identifier of the participant assigned by the data provider

meta.notes: Alphanumeric characters along with dot, hyphens and underscores are supported.  Maximum of 250 characters.

description.left: Indicate the type of treatment the participant received
description.right: Indicate the type of treatment the donor received

description.left: The participant's response to the treatment
description.right: The donor's response to the treatment

notes.left: For medication, provide date of first prescription dispensation (DD-MM-YYYY). For one-time treatments, such as surgeries, provide the date of the intervention.
notes.right: For medication, provide date of first prescription dispensation (MM-YYYY). For one-time treatments, such as surgeries, provide the date of the intervention.

description.right: Identifier of the diagnosis event, assigned by the data provider.

description.right: Time interval between primary diagnosis and follow-up event

description.left: Indicate the participant's disease status at time of follow-up
description.right: Indicate the donor's disease status at time of follow-up

notes.left: If the participant was clinically disease free following primary treatment and then relapse or recurrence or progression (for liquid tumors) occurred afterwards, then this field will indicate the length of disease free interval, in days.
notes.right: If the donor was clinically disease free following primary treatment and then relapse or recurrence or progression (for liquid tumors) occurred afterwards, then this field will indicate the length of disease free interval, in days.

smoking_pack_years.name: smoking_pack_years
smoking_pack_years.description: Number of packs of cigarettes per day multiplied by the number of years donor smoked

meta.notes: Not required if smoking history is unknown or if the donor never smoked. Pack-years is calculated by multiplying the number of packs of cigarettes (20 cigarettes per pack) smoked per day by the number of years the person has smoked. For example, 1 pack year is equal to smoking 1 pack per day for 1 year

meta.notes: Alphanumeric characters along with dot, hyphens and underscores are supported.  Maximum of 250 characters.

meta.notes: Alphanumeric characters along with dot, hyphens and underscores are supported.  Maximum of 250 characters.

Data from administrative health record, medical record or self-reported

French Canadian trace their ancestry to French colonists who settled in Canada, English Canadians are of English ethnic origin and heritage, Aboriginal (First Nations, Metis, Inuit), White (European descent), Arab (e.g. Egypt, Iraq, Jordan, Lebanon), Latin American (Hispanic), Black (African/Caribbean), East Asian (e.g. China, Japan, Korea, Taiwan), West Asian (e.g. Turkey, Iran, Afghanistan), Southeast Asian (e.g. Malaysia, Indonesia, Viet Nam), South Asian (e.g. India, Sri Lanka, Pakistan, Bangladesh), Filipino, Unknown, Other

vital_status.description: Donor's last known state of living or deceased
vital_status.name: vital_status

cause_of_death.description: Indicates the cause of a donor's death
cause_of_death.name: cause_of_death

meta.notes: Cause of death is only required to be submitted if the donor's vital_status is 'Deceased'.

age_of_death.description: Numeric value to represent the age of the donor at the time of death, in days
age_of_death.name: age_of_death

meta.notes: Age_of_death is only required to be submitted if the donor's vital_status is Deceased.
